divs: sighting detailsover the ocean\ coast line. indivdual lights that appeared in sequence to form a large triangle, then faded out. occured around 10 pm est toward the east. triangle was about 4x the size of casiopia and 60 degress above the horizon. one light reappeared. i ran home to get a camera and did not see another. this is my third sighting in this area.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Isle of Palms
There were no other sightings in Isle of Palms on or around August 11th 2010
